serviceAreaGuidelines.title: Service Area Guidelines:
serviceAreaGuidelines.local: Local: 5-20 km radius - Ideal for quick services and frequent visits

serviceAreaGuidelines.regional: Regional: 50-100 km radius - Extended coverage for larger service areas
serviceAreaGuidelines.extended: Extended: 100+ km radius - Maximum coverage for specialized services
